fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 216.95 points or 1.14% to settle at 19,189.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 0.80% to 10.80. Infosys, HDFC Bank and TCS were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
